name: Watch Ya Feet
description:
Platform: Windows Build: Unreal Engine 5 / C++

I made it for fun during Epic Mega Jam 2022 using Unreal Engine 5 there might still be some bugs but still well playable. The game is free to play with No Commercial Purpose! I hope everyone likes it and has some fun ^.^

GAMEPLAY

The theme is "As Above So Below"

You will play as a chubby bird or a chicken? 

Go get the key and avoid traps on the ground. Then take the elevator down to the bottom and open the door of victory. The traps are the same both above and below be sure to remember the locations of those traps! 

Control Keyboard: WASD
Mouse for camera control
